name: Memorize - Train your Brain!
description:
Improve your Memorization with Memorize! Repeat a sequence of three, four or six colors. With every color you remember correctly a new color is added to the sequence. Just like in the electronic game 'Simon' from the 90s!
Beat your friends' highscores on three leaderboards (Easy with 3 colors, Medium with 4 colors and hard with 6 colors) and show them the power of your mind!
